title: Katherine Brown
text:
I’m a Masters student in International Development at Sciences Po, looking for work as a data analyst.
I’m motivated to make the world a better place. My academic record speaks for itself, y’all!!! I’ve got 11 experience sections on LinkedIn!!!

Sciences Po | Masters in International Development | 2020-2022
University of Cape Town | Social Science Honours in Justice & Transformation with distinction | 2018
University of Cape Town | Bachelor of Arts in International Relations, French Literature and Psychology | 2015-2017

Oxfam | Research consultant | Mar 2021 - Present
Paris Peace Forum | Chargée du Programme des Bénévoles | Sep 2021 - Dec 2021
RAITH Foundation | Data Analysis Consultant | Nov 2019 - Dec 2020
South African Institute for Race Relations | Research Intern | Feb 2019 - Jul 2019

Harambee Youth Employment Accelerator (homepage) | Intern | Jul-Aug 2017
